Theatre. Live music. Community arts. Great food and drinks.

Printers Playhouse is a bar and live event venue in the heart of Eastbourne.

  • View Events

What is Printers Playhouse?

Printers Playhouse opened its doors in June 2015 as a brand new theatre, music venue and workshop space in central Eastbourne. Offering a wide artistic programme of productions, workshops, actor training and music, this Eastbourne Community Arts Hub offers a safe space for local artists and musicians to share, collaborate, learn and develop new skills.

  • About Us

Coming Soon to PPH

Art Club

14:00 Wednesday 15 Dec 2021

All abilities welcome to share and make art in a supportive environment. Looking for a creative community? Join our all abilities art group, a relaxed space to bring your own art work, share ideas or dabble in something new.

All abilities welcome to share and make art in a supportive environment.

To make a booking or to contact us, please email info@printersplayhouse.co.uk.

Xmas With The Golgis

21:00 Friday 17 Dec 2021

The South East's Premier Absurdist Pantomime Acoustic Theatre Art Alternative Folk Rock Band. Attempting to build on the huge success of their hit single 'It's Still a Hoover' (number 173 in the Billingshurst chart), The Golgis have now discovered even more instruments they are unable to play properly.

20:30, Free entry.

To make a booking or to contact us, please email info@printersplayhouse.co.uk.
